question: Who among the following rulers of Delhi Sultanate annexed the Sharqui Kingdom of Jaunpur?
explanation: In 1484 AD, Sultan Bahlol Lodhi captured Jaunpur and annexed the Sharqui Kingdom and died in 1488 AD. ( In 1393 AD, the Sharqui Kingdom of Jaunpur was founded by Malik Sarwar Sharquii (a noble of Firoj Shah Tughlaq)).
